addAdmin(address).return: True if address is an admin.

addStoreOwner(address).return: True if address is a storeOwner.

changeStatusEnrolledStoreOwner(address).details: change enrolled status of a storeOwner address
changeStatusEnrolledStoreOwner(address).return: False if address is no longer storeOwner

checkStoreOwner(address).return: True if address is a storeOwner

disableAdmin(address).return: False if address is no longer admin

getArticleIds().details: get articleIds from articles where seller is storeOwner
